entries.abort: The cargoship made it to hyper-space. Osae will not be pleased.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanners have picked up the cargoship. Stand by for coordinates.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The cargoship is making a run for it. An intercept course is plotted and locked in your nav computer.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters detected. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters eliminated. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.capture_complete: The vessel has responded to your warning and will head back to the planet. Escort it back and order it to land at the supplied coordinates.
entries.capture_phase_1: What are you doing? Do you know who you are dealing with?
entries.capture_phase_2: I will land back on Yavin at the designated coordinates.
entries.capture_started: Capture process beginning. The target vessel will have 30 seconds to comply or be destroyed.
entries.complete: The vessel is re-entering the planetary atmosphere on a trajectory to Osae's specified location. Return to Osae.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < %DI escort fighters remaining. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy escort fighters eliminated. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.failed_destroy: You were supposed to capture that ship, not destroy it.
entries.failed_escape: You were supposed to capture that ship, not let it get away.
entries.panic_1: They will rather see my cargo destoryed that to have it fall into your hands.
entries.panic_2: A few more hits and this ship will go nova. Help me!
entries.panic_3: The Black Sun are going to fry you.
entries.panic_4: I didn't sign on for this!
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable the freighter before it can leave the system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter back to the re-entry point and force it to land on the planet.
entries.quest_location_d: The ship is still in the Yavin system but it is probably getting ready to jump from the system. Intercept it before it can escape.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once disabled, move in close to the freighter and order it to proceed back to the planet. If the vessel refuses destory it.
entries.recovery_success: The cargo ship has landed and is in my hands. Come back and we will finish our business.
entries.target_disabled: The vessel's engine system is shut down. Move in close and order it to change course.
entries.taunt_2: You don't want to make the Black Sun your enemy.
entries.taunt_4: I don't know who you are working for but once I deal with you, I'll get him.
entries.taunt_5: You think we won't be escorting something this valuable?
entries.thanks_1: Thanks. I just fly the thing.
entries.thanks_2: They don't pay me enough to risk my life.
entries.thanks_3: Listen...as long as you protect me I will do whatever you say.
entries.thanks_4: Dark Sun enforcers don't worry about collateral damage. Thanks for keeping me alive.
entries.thanks_5: I just want to see the next sun rise.
entries.title: Yavin System: Capture the Black Sun cargo ship
entries.title_d: Osae has sent you on a mission to intercept and capture a cargo ship, carrying a load of Death Star salvage.
